content: the ava tank top is a cotton crochet tank top with ruffled straps square neckline and relaxed fit the tank falls just above the hips but since it s created from the neck down you can make the top as long or as short as you want the bottom of this top is finished off with front post & back post double_crochet ribbing tuck this top into a high waisted skirt or leave it loose for a casual relaxed look this pattern is accompanied by a video tutorial sizes xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl skill level easy check out more free crochet patterns here 1 sign up to my ** newsletter 2 ** and never miss a new crochet pattern release 1 https //forthefrills com 2 https //view flodesk com/pages/5ebf67c2ab499000265d1ad4
